translation.en: No! No!
Wakey, wakey.
Here comes the tickle monster.
Come on, it's time to get up.
Good morning. Be careful, please.
translation.es: Buen día. Tengan cuidado, por favor.

translation.en: Are you really gonna go all by yourself?
-I still have to do it. -But aren't you afraid?
translation.es: Aún tengo que hacerlo. Pero ¿no tienes miedo?

translation.en: I'm gonna be okay.
But what if you're not back in time-- [woman] Good morning.
translation.es: - ¿Y si no vuelves a tiempo…? - Buen día.

translation.en: How you feeling today, Mia?
-Fine, thanks. -Good.
translation.es: - ¿Cómo te sientes hoy, Mía? - Bien. - Gracias. - Bien.

translation.en: I was thinking of having a birthday dinner for you.
translation.es: Estaba pensando en tu cena de cumpleaños.

translation.en: Eighteen. It's a big deal.
I remember just yesterday
you were a scruffy teenager arriving at my house.
translation.es: eras una adolescente desaliñada que vino a mi casa.

translation.en: Yeah. Well, thank you.
But really, I don't need anything.
translation.es: Pero en serio, no necesito nada.

translation.en: -I really don't. -Oh, come on.
It's good for all the kids.
You're gonna be an adult.
Come on. It'll be nice.
-I'm gonna run to the library. -Okay.
translation.es: - Creo que iré a la biblioteca. - Bien.

translation.en: There are some books I wanna get.
Well, get some for when you're at the hospital too, okay?
translation.es: Busca unos para cuando estés en el hospital.

translation.en: Yeah, sure.
Hey, do you think I could borrow some money
for buses and, you know, snacks?
translation.es: para autobuses y, ya sabe, bocadillos?

translation.en: -Okay. -Pretty please.
-Yes, yes, yes. -You're the best.
translation.es: - ¿Por favor? - Sí. - Es la mejor. - Lo sé.

translation.en: -I know. -[chuckles]
Thank you. I'll be back before lunch, Mrs. R.
translation.es: Gracias. Vuelvo para almorzar, Sra. R.

translation.en: -Okay. -Thank you. Mwah.
-Bye. -Bye.
[Mrs. Rothswell] So, kids, what are we gonna do today?
[Josh] Hey, man, it's been a while.
Can you believe I've already been home for three weeks?
translation.es: ¿Puedes creer que llevo tres semanas en casa?

translation.en: I'm so bored. Come over.
You can't ignore me forever.
[mom] Morning. Cream or butter?
Thanks, Mom, but...
Right. Not hungry today either.
Hey, buddy.
Ah, well, um, we talked to Josh last night. Seems like he's doing a little bit better.
translation.es: Hablamos con Josh anoche. Parece que está un poco mejor.

translation.en: He asked us about you again and we told him--
translation.es: Preguntó por ti y le dijimos…

translation.en: Yeah, I know. I'm gonna go see him right now.
translation.es: Lo sé. Iré a verlo ahora mismo.

translation.en: -I think he'll appreciate that. -Yeah.
translation.es: Creo que lo agradecerá. Sí, ¿respondiste a la carta de la beca?

translation.en: Have you responded to the scholarship letter?
translation.es: Sí, ¿respondiste a la carta de la beca?

translation.en: Come on. Kyle, they are not gonna hold your place forever. Well, then they should give it to someone else.
translation.es: - Kyle, no reservarán tu lugar. - Deberían dársela a otro.

translation.en: -No, this is not-- -Honey.
Honey, you have the whole summer before you have to go.
translation.es: Cariño. Tienes todo el verano antes de irte.

translation.en: Sign the entrance enrollment. Then see how you feel.
translation.es: Firma la solicitud y ve cómo te sientes.

translation.en: I don't think I'll be back for lunch.
Hey, here, take this with you.
Here you go.
[whispers] I don't know what to say.
[mom] Why did you have to say that again?
[dad] He can't throw away his soccer scholarship.
translation.es: No puede desperdiciar su beca de fútbol.

translation.en: He didn't go to graduation, fine, but bailing on his scholarship?
translation.es: No fue a la graduación, está bien. Pero ¿renunciar a su beca?

translation.en: [mom] You've got to give him more time.
It's only been a few months since the accident.
translation.es: Solo pasaron unos meses desde el accidente.

translation.en: -He'll come around. -I hope so.
[chuckles] Hey, you got lost or what?
translation.es: Hola. ¿Te perdiste o qué? Dijiste que vendrías hace horas.

translation.en: Said you're coming hours ago.
translation.es: ¿Te perdiste o qué? Dijiste que vendrías hace horas.

translation.en: Yeah, I-I walked.
Hey, don't... [chuckles] Don't worry about it.
I know it looks bad, but it feels a lot worse.
translation.es: Sé que se ve mal, pero se siente mucho peor.

translation.en: So, um, where have you been?
First two editions of Sun Eater.
translation.es: Las primeras dos ediciones de Sun Eater.

translation.en: [laughs] Thanks, dude.
You're the best.
So have you talked to them yet?
Noah's parents?
They've called a bunch of times.
They wanna talk to us.
You still can't remember?
You know, what happened before the...
Me neither.
They say it's normal.
I'm so sorry, boys, but the, um, physical therapist called,
translation.es: Lo siento mucho, chicos, pero llamó el fisioterapeuta.

translation.en: he's gonna be here any minute, so I think you should...
Yeah, yeah, of course, um... [clears throat]
I-I'll come back later.
We haven't summoned the courage to tell him yet,
translation.es: Aún no reunimos el valor para decírselo, pero…

translation.en: but he may never walk again.
It's a blessing that you didn't get more hurt than you did.
translation.es: Por suerte, tú no saliste más herido.

translation.en: Just... Just look at you.
There's barely a scratch on you.
And Josh, he's just broken.
And Noah...
Noah...
There's not...
There's not an hour that goes by...
Not an hour goes by that I wish he hadn't gotten into that car with you.
translation.es: sin que deseara que no hubiera subido a ese auto contigo.

translation.en: [Josh's mom] I wish he hadn't gotten into that car with you.
translation.es: …que no hubiera subido a ese auto contigo.

translation.en: And Noah...
Just look at you, not a scratch on you.
He hadn't gotten into that car... Not a scratch on you.
translation.es: No hubiera subido… Apenas un rasguño.

translation.en: [Mia] Help!
Hey! Can you hear me?
Oh. Are you all right? You passed out.
Are you feeling better?
Get it off me, get it off me! Gross! Ooh!
Oh, I'm sorry.
Oh, it's-- I-I'm usually not this hysterical.
It's just that, um... When I was a kid, a lizard crawled into my bed once.
translation.es: Es que cuando era niña, un lagarto se metió en mi cama.

translation.en: When you're five years old, that could be traumatizing.
translation.es: A los cinco, puede ser traumático.

translation.en: People don't scream when they're about to pass out.
translation.es: La gente no grita cuando está por desmayarse.

translation.en: -No? -No.
Okay, well, I'm epileptic,
and so I can always tell when I'm about to faint. And because of that, I scream because I get scared.
translation.es: Sé cuando voy a desmayarme y grito porque me da miedo.

translation.en: Hold on. Hold on, hold on. I think that we should talk.
Just mind your own business.
No, no. Don't you get it? You are my business.
translation.es: ¡No! ¿No lo entiendes? Tú eres mi asunto.

translation.en: If I let you do what I think you were about to do,
translation.es: Si te dejo hacer lo que creo que harás,

translation.en: I will never be able to forgive myself.
And your mother would never be able to forgive me either.
translation.es: Y tu madre nunca podría perdonarme.

translation.en: Just go home.
-No. -Fine.
No. If you jump, I'm gonna jump.
translation.es: No. Si tú saltas, yo salto.

translation.en: What the...
Hey, stop!
Do you believe me now? Monkey see, monkey do.
translation.es: ¿Me crees ahora? Mono ve, mono hace.

translation.en: This has gotta be a nightmare.
-Just go away. -Never.
[gasps] Ooh, it's unlocked. -Give me my phone back. -Mm-mmm.
I'm gonna text myself so I have your number.
translation.es: Me escribiré así tengo tu número.

translation.en: -Who are you? -[cell phone beeps]
My name's Amelia.
Amelia Faith, but you can call me Mia.
translation.es: Amelia Faith, pero puedes llamarme Mía.

translation.en: -Hi. -Finally. I was getting worried.
translation.es: Hola. Por fin. Me estaba preocupando.

translation.en: I'm so sorry. I just-- I--
I lost track of time at the library.
translation.es: Perdí la noción del tiempo en la biblioteca.

translation.en: Mia, just be honest with me
and you better not have your fingers crossed behind your back.
translation.es: y no cruces los dedos en la espalda.

translation.en: Maybe we should try another counselor.
No, come on, Lisa, it has been months and he's getting worse day after day.
translation.es: No, vamos, Lisa, han pasado meses y está empeorando día tras día.

translation.en: And he won't talk. He won't eat.
translation.es: Y no habla. No quiere comer.

translation.en: I mean, he barely even looks at us anymore.
Hey.
[Lisa] How'd it go with Josh?
[Mia] I knew it.
[woman] Hey. If it isn't my favorite foster sis.
How's Mrs. Rothswell doing?
She's good.
Hey, can I ask you a favor?
Can you still do your responsible mother voice?
translation.es: ¿Aún puedes hacer tu voz de madre responsable?

translation.en: Hi, my name is Mia.
I'm a really good friend of Kyle's. [Lisa] Oh.
translation.es: Soy muy buena amiga de Kyle.

translation.en: Him and I were having a conversation the other day,
translation.es: Él y yo conversamos el otro día

translation.en: and he said that he's obviously going through a hard time.
translation.es: y dijo estar pasando un momento difícil.

translation.en: -[Lisa] Right. -And he really felt like he needed to get away.
translation.es: - Sí. - Y sintió que necesitaba alejarse.

translation.en: So I thought it might make you feel better if you could speak to my mom.
translation.es: Pensé que la haría sentir mejor hablar con mi mamá.

translation.en: -[Lisa] Yeah. -[Kyle] Damn it!
-[woman] Oh, hi. -Hi. Hi, Mrs. Faith.
[Lisa] It's just such a surprise.
Thank you very much, Mrs. Faith.
We'll be sure to let him know.
Such an amazing offer.
Oh? Yeah, he's been going through tough times.
Here he is now.
Yeah. Thanks, Mom. Okay, bye.
She is so chatty.
Hey, so I was just filling your parents in on what we talked about yesterday.
translation.es: Hola, estaba informando a tus padres sobre lo que hablamos ayer.

translation.en: With you saying that you needed to get away.
And my mom inviting you to spend some time with us in Spain.
translation.es: Y mi mamá te invita a pasar un tiempo con nosotros en España.

translation.en: She's a photographer, a really, really good one.
And so she travels a lot, and she's been there for a week already
translation.es: Viaja mucho y ya lleva una semana allí

translation.en: and she says that we're just gonna love it.
[Lisa] She seems really nice.
But, Kyle, honey, why haven't you ever told us about Mia?
translation.es: Pero, Kyle, cariño, ¿por qué nunca nos has hablado de Mía?

translation.en: -Because I just-- -No, no. No, no.
You're not gonna tell them how we met, are you?
translation.es: No les dirás cómo nos conocimos, ¿no?

translation.en: That is so embarrassing. [laughs]
Okay, so you're saying that you wanna travel now?
Mm-hmm, he said that he would not miss it.
translation.es: Dijo que no se lo perdería.

translation.en: Can I talk to Mia in private?
-Mm-hmm? -Yeah.
What are you doing here?
Trying to get your parents on board for you to come to Spain.
translation.es: Intento que tus padres te dejen venir a España.

translation.en: -Spain? -Yes. Spain.
The place between France and Portugal.
translation.es: El lugar entre Francia y Portugal.

translation.en: Come with me for ten days. All expenses paid.
translation.es: Ven conmigo por diez días. Todo pago.

translation.en: Just get out of town for a little while. Forget it.
translation.es: - Vete de la ciudad por un tiempo. - Olvídalo.

translation.en: Okay, look, your parents are very nice,
translation.es: Bien, mira, tus padres son muy amables,

translation.en: but they also seem very concerned for your well-being.
translation.es: pero parecen muy preocupados por tu bienestar.

translation.en: I could tell them how we actually met or you could come with me.
translation.es: Podría decirles cómo nos conocimos o podrías venir conmigo.

translation.en: And if you still wanna kick the bucket after the trip, I won't stop you. Deal?
translation.es: Y si aún quieres morir después del viaje, no te detendré. ¿Trato?

translation.en: Mom, Dad. Mia's leaving.
Look, you can think about it. You don't have to decide now.
translation.es: Puedes pensarlo. No tienes que decidir ahora.

translation.en: You can just let me know tonight or-- or maybe tomorrow.
translation.es: Puedes avisarme esta noche o mañana.

translation.en: I'll be back.
It was really nice to meet you guys. Thank you so much.
translation.es: Fue un placer conocerlos. Muchas gracias.

translation.en: My mom, she just wanted me to meet you guys in person.
translation.es: Mi mamá quería que los conociera en persona.

translation.en: There are so many, you know, crazy people out there.
translation.es: Hay mucha gente loca por ahí.

translation.en: -She just... -[Lisa] Of course.
-It was a pleasure to meet you. -Really nice meeting you.
translation.es: - Fue un placer. - Encantado de conocerlos.

translation.en: Um, hon, just to let you know, your-your shirt's on inside out.
translation.es: Cariño, tienes la camisa al revés.

translation.en: -Oh, no, I do that on purpose. -Oh!
It makes me feel like I'm a little bit less conventional, -or something. -Oh.
translation.es: Me hace sentir menos convencional o algo.

translation.en: Oh, wait. Hey, Kyle.
Don't forget to text me a picture of your passport and all that jazz.
translation.es: No olvides enviarme una foto de tu pasaporte.

translation.en: We leave in three days.
[softly] I'm gonna kill you.
[laughs] Yay. Bye.
Why do you think he never said anything about her? She's lovely.
translation.es: ¿Por qué crees que nunca habló de ella? Es adorable.

translation.en: He hasn't told us anything in three months.
translation.es: No nos ha dicho nada en tres meses.

translation.en: Come in.
Hey, buddy. Your mom and I just finished reading this.
translation.es: Hola, amigo. Tu mamá y yo acabamos de leer esto.

translation.en: We thought you might get something out of it.
Hey, you know what? I got an idea.
What do you say that you and I take a soccer ball,
translation.es: ¿Qué dices si tomamos una pelota de fútbol

translation.en: hit the field, you can work on your PKs.
translation.es: ¿Qué dices si tomamos una pelota de fútbol y practicas penales?

translation.en: I don't think you can score on me today.
translation.es: No creo que puedas anotarme hoy.

translation.en: No, I'm okay.
Okay. Plan B.
There is a big FIFA match tonight.
translation.es: Hoy hay un gran partido de la FIFA.

translation.en: You, me, pizza. Watching it together on the couch.
translation.es: Tú, yo, pizza. Viéndolo juntos en el sofá.

translation.en: Not tonight, okay?
Son...
I know what you're going through is incredibly challenging,
translation.es: Sé que lo que estás atravesando es muy difícil,

translation.en: but you can't stay locked up in your room day after day, hiding.
translation.es: pero no puedes pasar todos los días en tu habitación escondiéndote.

translation.en: Can we please not do this?
No, we are. We're gonna do this right now. You've been pushing us away for too long.
translation.es: No, sí. Lo haremos ahora mismo. Nos has estado alejando demasiado tiempo.

translation.en: Something has to change.
Do you think that if you get out of here and you go to Spain, that that's gonna help?
translation.es: ¿Crees que si sales de aquí y te vas a España, eso ayudará?

translation.en: 'Cause if you do, I want you to go.
translation.es: Si es así, quiero que vayas.

translation.en: -No, I don't wanna go. -You don't wanna go?
What do you wanna do?
You wanna stay in here for another three months, moping?
translation.es: ¿Quieres quedarte aquí otros tres meses deprimido?

translation.en: -What do you want from me? -I want my son back.
translation.es: - ¿Qué quieres de mí? - A mi hijo de vuelta.

translation.en: I want you.
He's gone, Dad.
What?
[sighs] Kyle.
Here.
Go find him.
This is for you.
Looks pretty. Like you.
Do you really have to go?
Yeah.
This is my chance to get some answers, Becca.
translation.es: Es mi oportunidad de obtener respuestas.

translation.en: I hope you can understand.
Hey, come here.
I have to tell you something really important.
My best friend once told me,
translation.es: Mi mejor amigo me dijo una vez:

translation.en: no matter what happens, no matter where I am,
translation.es: "Pase lo que pase, no importa dónde esté,

translation.en: there will always be somebody somewhere who is glad you were born.
translation.es: siempre habrá alguien, en algún lugar, feliz de que hayas nacido".

translation.en: Okay? So don't be sad.
Why are you smiling?
I just got some good news about my trip.
translation.es: Acabo de recibir buenas noticias de mi viaje.

translation.en: [announcer on PA] Good morning, ladies and gentlemen.
On behalf of the captain and crew, we would like to welcome you aboard.
translation.es: En nombre del capitán y la tripulación, les damos la bienvenida.

translation.en: Our flight to Madrid, Spain will be 13 hours...
translation.es: Nuestro vuelo a Madrid será de 13 horas…

translation.en: I am so excited.
I've been planning this trip for years,
but I've been thinking about it, well, forever.
translation.es: pero he pensado en esto, bueno, desde siempre.

translation.en: Have you ever had a dream and it finally comes true
translation.es: ¿Has tenido un sueño y se hizo realidad

translation.en: and then you just don't know what to feel?
That is exactly what I'm feeling right now.
translation.es: Eso es lo que siento ahora.

translation.en: [announcer] Please take a moment to review the safety data card
translation.es: Por favor, revisen la tarjeta de seguridad

translation.en: in the seat pocket in front of you.
Hey, hey, maybe we ought to watch this.
To fasten your seatbelt,
insert the metal fitting one into the other,
translation.es: Inserten el accesorio de metal uno en el otro

translation.en: tighten by pulling the loose ends of the straps.
translation.es: y ajústenlo tirando de los extremos de las correas.

translation.en: Should the cabin experience any pressure loss,
translation.es: Si la cabina experimenta pérdida de presión,

translation.en: stay calm and listen for instructions from your cabin crew.
translation.es: mantengan la calma y escuchen a la tripulación.

translation.en: -Oxygen masks will... -Oh! Cool, thank you.
translation.es: Las máscaras de oxígeno… Genial, gracias.

translation.en: Place the mask over your mouth and nose.
translation.es: Colóquenla sobre la boca y la nariz.

translation.en: If you are traveling with children,
make sure your own mask is on first before helping them.
translation.es: pónganse su propia máscara antes de ayudarlos.

translation.en: It's my first time on an airplane.
translation.es: Es mi primera vez en un avión.

translation.en: It's actually my first time outside of California.
translation.es: Y mi primera vez fuera de California.

translation.en: Isn't that so exciting?
I've always wondered what it would be like on an airplane.
translation.es: Me preguntaba cómo sería un avión.

translation.en: How big upper-ahead storage would be?
translation.es: Qué tan grande sería el almacenamiento.

translation.en: I thought it would be smaller than this, actually. I was pleasantly surprised.
translation.es: Pensé que sería más chico. Me sorprendió gratamente.

translation.en: -Oh, here it is. -Ah!
So you're the girl who booked the Tuk Tuk a year ago.
translation.es: Así que eres la chica que reservó la tuk-tuk hace un año.

translation.en: -You like to plan ahead. -[Mia, surfer chuckle]
So, I guess that's Noah?
No. No, Noah couldn't make it.
-Oh, okay. -Ah. But this is Kyle.
-Here is his info. -[man] Bueno.
Then if you can give Noah his receipt,
translation.es: Si le puedes dar su recibo a Noah,

translation.en: then I will just add Kyle to the paperwork, and yes.
translation.es: agregaré a Kyle al papeleo y listo.

translation.en: Okay, this is for you.
-Let's go see the van. -Okay.
[grunts] Here she is.
Fully equipped, exactly as advertised.
You have a kitchen, you have a stove, uh, the bed on the back,
translation.es: Tienen una cocina, un horno, la cama atrás

translation.en: and you also have Bluetooth connection,
if you want to listen to music while you drive.
It'll be perfect. [chuckles]
I guess that's pretty much it, so, uh, see you in ten days.
translation.es: Supongo que eso es todo, así que nos vemos en diez días.

translation.en: Oh, could you please take care of her for me, okay?
-Mm-hmm. -Here.
You must be crazy if you think I'm getting in this thing with you.
translation.es: Estás loca si crees que me subiré a esto.

translation.en: Especially with you behind the wheel.
No, I don't know how to drive.
translation.es: - Menos si tú conduces. - No. No sé conducir.

translation.en: -You're driving. -The hell I am.
♪ Her hair is kinda wild and... ♪
Hey, hey. Nobody turns off my favorite song.
It's a good song.
You know, on second thought,
I think that we might need to renegotiate the terms of our agreement.
translation.es: creo que debemos renegociar los términos de nuestro acuerdo.

translation.en: At this rate, I'm gonna need like a month to hit up all the places I'd like to visit.
translation.es: Y a esta velocidad, necesitaré como un mes para visitar los lugares que quiero.

translation.en: Oh, come-- come on.
You're really not gonna ask me anything?
Nothing about this trip?
Nothing about me?
Okay, okay. We can talk about you.
Or not.
So, I bet you're wondering why I'm taking so many pictures?
translation.es: Apuesto a que te preguntas por qué tomo tantas fotos.

translation.en: They're for my Photolog,
"Expiration Date."
You know? Expiration date.
It's like a metaphor.
Okay. [chuckles]
How about this? I am starving.
I bet you are too.
Okay, um, the next exit, there's a restaurant that has 4.7 stars.
translation.es: Bien, en la próxima salida, hay un restaurante con 4.7 estrellas.

translation.en: Yeah, this exit.
Kyle! Kyle!
Don't ever do that again.
I'm sorry, I just thought that-- Just stop!
Stop thinking. Stop talking.
translation.es: Basta de pensar. Basta de hablar.

translation.en: Just stop.
Okay.
I'll be inside.
[chuckles] Ah, I think you mean pollo, chicken?
-Oh, si. Pollo. -Yeah. Okay.
-Something else? -Uh, yeah. Uh, a muffin?
-Of course. -Por favor.
[clears throat] So are you gonna tell me what this trip's about?
translation.es: ¿Me dirás de qué se trata este viaje?

translation.en: He speaks. [laughs]
Are you okay?
Do you need me to call an ambulance or something?
You must be delirious.
So?
So this trip is about finding my mom.
translation.es: Bien. Este viaje se trata de encontrar a mi mamá.

translation.en: Finding her?
Didn't she talk to my parents about meeting us out here?
translation.es: ¿No habló con mis padres sobre vernos aquí?

translation.en: No, that was, uh, that was my foster sister.
translation.es: No. Esa fue mi hermana adoptiva.

translation.en: -What? -Yeah.
Yeah. The thing is, is that I don't...
translation.es: Sí. Lo que pasa es que…

translation.en: I don't know my mom. She left me.
translation.es: no conozco a mi mamá. Me abandonó.

translation.en: Hey, but the cool thing is, is that it's my birthday.
translation.es: Pero lo bueno es que es mi cumpleaños.

translation.en: And how awesome would it be
if I got to meet my mom on the day that I was born?
translation.es: si pudiera conocer a mi mamá el día que nací?

translation.en: [clears throat] Happy birthday, Mia.
Thanks.
So where does this mom of yours live?
Well, over the last two years I've been doing a lot of research
translation.es: En los últimos dos años, estuve investigando mucho

translation.en: and I came up with ten mother candidates.
translation.es: y tengo diez candidatas a madre.

translation.en: The first is in Segovia.
Well, looks like you'll meet her pretty soon then.
We just passed a sign that says six kilometers to Segovia.
translation.es: Ese letrero decía seis kilómetros para Segovia.

translation.en: Six kilometers?
No. No, why didn't you say something?
translation.es: No. No, ¿por qué no dijiste nada? No puedo conocer a mi mamá así.

translation.en: No, I can't meet my mom like this.
translation.es: No, ¿por qué no dijiste nada? No puedo conocer a mi mamá así.

translation.en: I brought my favorite shirt for her. I-I have to change.
translation.es: Traje mi camisa favorita. Tengo que cambiarme.

translation.en: I can't believe that this is finally happening right now.
translation.es: No puedo creer que esto esté sucediendo.

translation.en: -I mean, the moment is here-- -Mia, curtain!
Look, I'm sorry, I just-- This is my favorite shirt and I got it just to meet her.
translation.es: Perdón, es mi camisa favorita y la compré solo para conocerla.

translation.en: God, get yourself together, Mia Faith.
It's getting a little late, don't you think?
I mean, we shouldn't just be barging in on somebody unexpectedly at this time.
translation.es: No deberíamos aparecer inesperadamente a esta hora.

translation.en: I mean, they could be having dinner.
Still pretty light out. Plus, I heard they have dinner pretty late.
translation.es: Aún hay luz. Además, oí que aquí cenan tarde.

translation.en: No, we just landed today and I'm exhausted.
translation.es: No. Llegamos hoy y estoy exhausta.

translation.en: You know, I booked us a place for tonight.
translation.es: Reservé un lugar para esta noche.

translation.en: Maybe we could go there and get some rest,
translation.es: Tal vez podríamos ir y descansar

translation.en: and then we can go meet her tomorrow.
translation.es: y luego ir a verla mañana.

translation.en: Happy birthday, Mia.
Oh, come on. Don't tell me that you like to sleep in.
translation.es: No me digas que te gusta dormir hasta tarde.

translation.en: Kyle?
Kyle?
No. No, no.
-[line ringing] -Come on.
Pick up.
What? Where were you?
Oh, good morning to you too.
I was taking a shower, and on my way back, I got us some breakfast.
translation.es: Me estaba bañando. Al volver, compré el desayuno.

translation.en: And you just took all your stuff with you to go take a shower?
translation.es: ¿Y te llevaste todas tus cosas para bañarte?

translation.en: Oh, actually, yes.
You were out cold,
I don't wanna be grabbing stuff out of my bag, making noise.
translation.es: No quería sacar cosas del bolso, hacer ruido.

translation.en: Oh, so you weren't planning on leaving me and just taking off?
Of course not. Deal's a deal, right?
translation.es: Claro que no. Un trato es un trato, ¿no?

translation.en: Hey, watch the chocolate.
Thank you.
Thank you for staying.
[Mia] Ah! No, no, no. How did that happen?
I spilled the hot chocolate.
I'm such a klutz, I spilled it everywhere.
translation.es: Soy muy torpe. Lo derramé por todos lados.

translation.en: I'm so sorry.
What am I supposed to do?
I can't show up to meet my mom like this.
translation.es: No puedo ir a ver a mi mamá así.

translation.en: Oh, man.
I can't believe this happened.
translation.es: No puedo creer que haya pasado.

translation.en: This is my favorite shirt and I really wanted to wear it.
translation.es: Es mi camisa favorita y quería usarla.

translation.en: [Kyle] Hang on. I think I got an idea.
translation.es: Espera. Creo que tengo una idea.

translation.en: [Mia] Why are you stopping?
Come on. We gotta get you some new clothes.
No, I'm fine, really, I'll figure something out.
translation.es: Estoy bien, en serio. Ya se me ocurrirá algo.

translation.en: "I'll figure something out." I'm not lending you my clothes.
translation.es: "Se me ocurrirá algo". No te prestaré mi ropa.

translation.en: I can't.
Really, I'm on a very tight budget this trip.
Well, consider it a belated birthday gift.
-No. No, I can't accept it. -Of course you can.
translation.es: No. - No puedo aceptarlo. - Claro que sí.

translation.en: Plus, my dad gave me his credit card and if he sees I'm not spending any money out here,
translation.es: Mi papá me dio su tarjeta de crédito y si ve que no estoy gastando,

translation.en: then I don't know, he'll call the embassy or something.
translation.es: llamará a la embajada o algo así.

translation.en: Okay, fine. Whatever.
You're crazy. Did you buy the entire store?
You need clothes. I couldn't make up my mind.
Okay, but I'm paying you back every penny.
translation.es: Pero te pagaré hasta el último centavo.

translation.en: Thank you.
You're not wearing your clothes inside out.
translation.es: No te la pusiste al revés.

translation.en: What for? They're new.
What's this?
Yeah, yeah, I know. You can't accept it, but it's my birthday gift to you.
translation.es: Sí, no puedes aceptarlo. Pero es mi regalo de cumpleaños.

translation.en: Happy birthday.
Oh! Thank you.
What do you think? Too big. Let's go get you new ones.
translation.es: - ¿Qué opinas? - Muy grandes. Vamos por otros.

translation.en: No. No, I love them.
I've never had any before.
Ray-Bans? It doesn't get more classic than that.
translation.es: ¿Unos Ray-Ban? No hay nada más clásico que eso.

translation.en: No. Sunglasses.
Okay, one down.
Which means we're one mother closer. Right?
It's still pretty early.
Got a lot of rounds to make. What's the next address?
translation.es: Son muchas visitas. ¿Cuál es la siguiente dirección?

translation.en: -No luck? -No.
Uh, the... My mom asked for pictures.
I just thought she'd liked the street, thought it was pretty.
translation.es: Pensé que le gustaría la calle, me pareció bonita.

translation.en: Oh, and here I thought you wanted to immortalize me
translation.es: Y yo que pensé que querías inmortalizarme

translation.en: in one of your drawings and needed my picture as a model.
translation.es: en uno de tus dibujos y necesitabas mi foto.

translation.en: Silly me.
Oh. Wow.
Nice moves.
Too bad those kids aren't scouts. You could get a scholarship.
translation.es: Lástima que no son reclutadores. Podrías pedir una beca.

translation.en: I had a scholarship but I didn't sign the paperwork.
translation.es: Tenía una beca, pero no firmé los papeles.

translation.en: Why not?
Got tricked to going into Spain with some girl trying to meet her mom.
translation.es: Me engañaron para ir a España con una chica que busca a su mamá.

translation.en: [Kyle] Let's get a nice lunch on me.
-What are those? -Just my vitamins.
-Hmm. You know what I don't get? -Hmm?
How the heck you were planning on making this trip work if you don't know how to drive?
translation.es: ¿Cómo planeabas hacer este viaje si no sabes conducir?

translation.en: My best friend was supposed to come.
translation.es: Mi mejor amigo iba a venir.

translation.en: He really wanted to help me find my mom, but he couldn't make it.
translation.es: Quería ayudarme a encontrar a mi mamá, pero no pudo venir.

translation.en: And you still have to tell me
how you came up with this hit list of mother candidates.
translation.es: cómo hiciste esta lista de candidatas a madre.

translation.en: Okay, so my former foster brother turned hacker helped me look into it.
translation.es: Mi exhermano adoptivo, que se hizo hacker, me ayudó a investigar.

translation.en: She's from Spain
and she was a former exchange student in California.
translation.es: y fue estudiante de intercambio en California.

translation.en: You know, he actually helped me find this.
So what, you just like searched up every woman with this name in Spain?
translation.es: ¿Buscaste a todas las mujeres con este nombre en España?

translation.en: Yeah. And the States too.
translation.es: Sí. Y en Estados Unidos también.

translation.en: Fortunately there weren't many women with that last name.
That, and then Spanish women, they actually never lose their maiden names.
translation.es: Y las españolas nunca dejan su apellido de soltera.

translation.en: I just got really fed up with all the unanswered questions.
translation.es: Me cansé de las preguntas sin respuesta.

translation.en: Who was she? What happened to her?
What's her family like?
What's my family like?
This is the only thing I have of hers.
translation.es: Esto es lo único que tengo de ella.

translation.en: [Kyle] That's really pretty.
Yeah.
And at least you have like foster siblings, right?
translation.es: Y al menos tienes hermanos adoptivos, ¿no?

translation.en: Twenty-four.
I moved around a lot.
Twelve different homes in my 18 years in the system.
translation.es: Doce hogares en 18 años en el sistema.

translation.en: That's a lot of homes.
Yeah, but none of them are real homes.
translation.es: Sí, pero ninguna es un hogar real.

translation.en: Not like yours.
I've officially aged out of the system now anyway.
translation.es: Ya estoy fuera del sistema oficialmente.

translation.en: But Mrs. Rothswell did say that I could stay with her until I go to college.
translation.es: Pero la Sra. Rothswell dijo que podía quedarme hasta la universidad.

translation.en: Oh, what are you doing? I said I was gonna pay. I just wanna see how much I owe you.
translation.es: - ¿Qué haces? Iba a pagar. - Quiero ver cuánto te debo.

translation.en: No. "My treat" means you don't have to pay for it. I know that's what it means. I just--
translation.es: - "Yo invito" significa que no pagas. - Sé qué significa.

translation.en: -Oh, sorry. -Um. No, it's okay.
Kyle!
Noah Green is your friend that was supposed to come on this trip
translation.es: Noah Green es tu amigo que iba a venir a este viaje.

translation.en: and you didn't think to mention that fact to me?
What is this? Some kind of sick joke?
No. No, he was my best friend.
translation.es: No. No, era mi mejor amigo.

translation.en: He set this whole trip up.
And you choose to bring me.
translation.es: Y tú elegiste traerme a mí.

translation.en: The reason he's gone.
translation.es: La razón por la que murió.

translation.en: What do you want from me?
I don't know.
I recognized you at the park and when I saw you about to jump, I...
translation.es: Te reconocí en el parque y cuando te vi a punto de saltar,

translation.en: I thought that I could help you.
I thought that maybe we could help each other.
Kyle, I am so sorry.
We met in photography class a few summers ago.
translation.es: Nos conocimos en clase de fotografía. Hace unos veranos.

translation.en: We just hit it off instantly.
He bought the plane tickets.
He helped me save my money.
[chuckles] He even found the van.
We were in the, uh, the same grade growing up.
I remember... playing freeze tag.
And in first grade, we were on the same soccer team,
translation.es: En primer grado, estábamos en el mismo equipo de fútbol.

translation.en: but, um... he stopped playing.
And then, uh, we-- we'd see each other in the halls...
translation.es: Y luego nos veíamos en los pasillos

translation.en: and-- and nod, and... that was it.
translation.es: y nos asentíamos y… eso era todo.

translation.en: I wish I had known him better.
He was a one of a kind human.
This says that the sand dunes are unmissable
translation.es: Esto dice que las dunas son imperdibles

translation.en: and that there's gonna be a meteor shower tonight.
translation.es: y que habrá una lluvia de meteoritos esta noche.

translation.en: No habla Español. English?
-American? -Si, American.
[in English] License and registration.
Oh, yes. Yes.
Did you know why I pulled you over?
You were driving too slow.
Too slow.
First time, warning.
Second time, fine.
-Okay. -Okay?
Okay, okay.
You have to be the only person under 80
translation.es: Debes ser la única persona menor de 80

translation.en: to be stopped for driving too slow.
translation.es: que es detenida por conducir lento.

translation.en: Let's go, gramps. Vamos!
Can you smell it?
I've died and gone to Venus.
You're certainly from out of this world, so makes a lot of sense.
translation.es: No eres de este mundo, así que tiene mucho sentido.

translation.en: [chuckles] Let's get in the water.
Are you nuts? In your clothes?
Oh, come on! Come on, live a little.
Come on.
I think we should have dinner before we miss the meteor shower.
translation.es: Deberíamos cenar antes de la lluvia de meteoritos.

translation.en: Yeah.
You-- You are such a jerk! Get out of here! [laughs]
[Mia] What's your favorite place in the universe?
translation.es: ¿Cuál es tu lugar favorito en el universo?

translation.en: Mine is Venus.
I wish I could just think about being there
translation.es: Ojalá pudiera pensar en estar ahí y ¡bum!

translation.en: and boom, I'm there.
translation.es: Ojalá pudiera pensar en estar ahí y ¡bum! Ahí estoy.

translation.en: What's your deal with Venus? Why you like it so much?
translation.es: ¿Qué tiene Venus? ¿Por qué te gusta tanto?

translation.en: On my Venus, there's no war,
translation.es: En mi Venus… no hay guerra.

translation.en: no pain or hunger.
On my Venus, there aren't parents who don't love their children,
translation.es: En mi Venus, no hay padres que no aman a sus hijos

translation.en: or even...
Death?
Death isn't such a scary thing, Kyle.
translation.es: La muerte no es tan aterradora, Kyle.

translation.en: You know when you're dead...
you can't laugh anymore,
or hang out with your friends,
translation.es: o pasar el rato con tus amigos

translation.en: or fall in love,
or eat a hamburger.
Death sucks.
It was an accident.
I lost control of the car.
It was me.
I was the one that was behind the wheel.
And I wasn't even supposed to be driving Josh's car.
translation.es: No debía conducir el auto de Josh.

translation.en: Kyle, Noah would not wanna see you like this.
translation.es: Kyle. Noah no querría verte así.

translation.en: I don't know that.
And you can't ask him.
And it's not even just Noah.
My friend Josh,
I don't know if he'll ever walk again.
translation.es: No sé si volverá a caminar.

translation.en: Who can live with that?
Not me.
Kyle, there has to be a reason that you made it out okay when the others didn't.
translation.es: Kyle, debe haber una razón por la que saliste ileso y los demás no.

translation.en: This world, it can be really harsh
translation.es: Este mundo puede ser muy duro

translation.en: and really bad things can happen,
translation.es: y pueden pasar cosas muy malas,

translation.en: but you cannot give up because you made a mistake.
translation.es: pero no puedes rendirte por cometer un error.

translation.en: You've been given a second chance to make a difference in this world.
translation.es: Tienes una segunda oportunidad para hacer una diferencia.

translation.en: It's all in how you look at it.
translation.es: Todo depende de cómo lo ves.

translation.en: I could be really upset that my mom left me.
translation.es: Podría enojarme porque mi mamá me abandonó.

translation.en: Or I could just be happy that she even had me.
translation.es: O podría estar feliz de que me tuvo.

translation.en: I wish I never existed.
Hey.
Noah used to tell me,
"There will always be somebody somewhere
who is happy that you were born."
Kyle? [gasping]
Mia!
Hey! Hey, it's been two hours. When on Earth are you gonna tell me something?
translation.es: Han pasado dos horas. ¿Cuándo van a decirme algo?

translation.en: Uh, are you with Amelia Faith?
-Yeah. Is she okay? -Yes. Yes, don't worry.
translation.es: - Sí. ¿Está bien? - Sí, no se preocupe.

translation.en: It happens with people in her condition. We are discharging her now.
translation.es: Pasa en gente con su condición. La vamos a dar de alta.

translation.en: Wait, wait, what condition?
Oh, I thought...
Well, in that case, it's better if she tells you herself.
translation.es: En ese caso, es mejor que se lo diga ella misma.

translation.en: Hey. Hey, are you okay?
What condition was that doctor talking about, Mia?
I'm fine. Just forgot to take my pill.
translation.es: Estoy bien. Olvidé tomar mi píldora.

translation.en: Yeah, your vitamins. When are you gonna tell me what's actually going on?
translation.es: Sí, ¿tus vitaminas? ¿Cuándo me dirás qué está pasando?

translation.en: Okay, what's going on is that I have a genetic heart defect.
translation.es: Bien. Lo que pasa es que tengo un defecto cardíaco genético.

translation.en: There. Boom.
So it's fine. I'm releasing you from our agreement.
translation.es: Así que está bien. Te libero de nuestro acuerdo.

translation.en: No, no, I'm-- I'm not gonna just up and leave you.
translation.es: No me iré y te dejaré.

translation.en: We had a deal, right?
It's fine. I'm used to it by now.
translation.es: - Teníamos un trato. - Está bien. Ya estoy acostumbrada.

translation.en: No, Mia!
You have an awesome chauffeur
for the next couple of days, so come on.
translation.es: por los próximos días, así que vamos.

translation.en: Mrs. Rothswell?
There's something I have to tell you.
Okay. Who are you avoiding?
My foster mom.
[Kyle] Why?
[Mia] I kind of ran away.
And that I didn't tell her where I was going.
translation.es: Y no le dije adónde iba.

translation.en: Why not?
Because Mrs. Rothswell wanted me to stay home and have the surgery.
translation.es: Porque quería que me quedara en casa y me operara.

translation.en: Wait, hold on. What surgery?
I had an operation scheduled for this week.
You decided to travel to Spain instead?
My doctor said it was perfectly safe for me to travel.
translation.es: Mi doctor dijo que era seguro viajar.

translation.en: And what's the point of waiting my entire life
translation.es: ¿Y qué sentido tiene esperar toda mi vida

translation.en: just to die on an operating table before I get to meet my mom?
translation.es: para morir en una cirugía antes de conocer a mi mamá?

translation.en: How dangerous is the surgery?
Half of the people die, but half of them live.
translation.es: La mitad se muere. Pero la mitad vive.

translation.en: Are you, uh... Are you scared?
Death has never really scared me.
Then what are you afraid of, Mia Faith?
translation.es: Entonces, ¿a qué le temes, Mía Faith?

translation.en: I guess what I'm afraid of is dying invisible.
translation.es: Supongo que le temo a morir invisible.

translation.en: If you don't make a difference in somebody's life,
translation.es: Si no haces una diferencia en la vida de alguien,

translation.en: if you don't even try to change the world, then what's the point of ever being born?
translation.es: si ni siquiera intentas cambiar el mundo, ¿cuál es el sentido de nacer?

translation.en: Of ever living?
-Hence your Photolog. -Yeah, I guess.
translation.es: - Por eso tu fotolog. - Sí, supongo.

translation.en: -Okay, so how many views? -No idea.
-Seriously? -Yeah.
-Give me your phone. -[laughs]
Okay.
[Kyle] Hmm, oh. No wonder here.
Your account was on private.
Why didn't you tell me about your heart?
translation.es: ¿Por qué no me dijiste sobre tu corazón?

translation.en: I guess I just...
I wanted to see what it would feel like to be a normal girl for once.
translation.es: ver cómo se sentiría ser una chica normal por una vez.

translation.en: [Mia] Hold it.
You're seriously taking pictures right now? Come on, we've got moms to meet. Let's go.
translation.es: - ¿Estás tomando fotos? - Tenemos mamás que ver. Vamos.

translation.en: [Kyle] Well, this is the last mother.
translation.es: Bueno, esta es la última madre.

translation.en: She has to be the one.
I guess our journey ends here.
Um, you know, you're-- you and your mom are probably gonna have a lot to talk about.
translation.es: Tu mamá y tú tendrán mucho de qué hablar.

translation.en: So in case I don't get another chance to tell you, I just--
translation.es: Si no tengo oportunidad de decírtelo…

translation.en: Wait, um...
Let's just enjoy this moment.
-Wait, hi! Hi! -Excuse me. -Excuse me. -Hi. Hi.
Maria Astilleros?
I'm sorry to bother you. Do you speak English?
[in English] Uh, little rusty.
I haven't really practiced
since I was an exchange student in the USA...
translation.es: desde que fui estudiante de intercambio en Estados Unidos.

translation.en: a long time ago in New York.
translation.es: Hace mucho tiempo en Nueva York.

translation.en: Wait, did you say, um, New York?
Oh, I...
We were looking for somebody, but, um... but we were wrong.
translation.es: Buscábamos a alguien, pero nos equivocamos.

translation.en: I'm sorry.
[Kyle] Excuse us. Thank you so much. We're looking for someone else.
translation.es: Disculpe. Gracias. Buscamos a alguien más.

translation.en: -Sorry. -Okay.
It's not her.
-Mia... -Kyle, I...
I just need some space.
But...
Mia's phone. Please leave a message after the beep.
translation.es: Soy Mía, deja un mensaje después del tono.

translation.en: -[beep] -Mia, where are you?
I've been waiting a long time. Please answer.
translation.es: Ya esperé mucho. Por favor, contesta.

translation.en: Have you guys, um, seen, uh, blonde hair, uh, uh...
Mia's phone. Please leave a message after the beep.
translation.es: Soy Mía, deja un mensaje después del tono.

translation.en: The next campsite is two hours away.
translation.es: El próximo campamento está a dos horas.

translation.en: I got a better idea.
[receptionist] Let me check if there are any available rooms.
Mia, look.
It's beautiful.
You are in luck. We just had a cancellation.
translation.es: Están de suerte. Tuvimos una cancelación.

translation.en: It's a room with a king size bed.
Okay.
Whoa!
[laughing] Kyle, this is crazy nice.
Wow. It's so beautiful.
This room is amazing!
This is so cool!
This is bigger than my whole house. [laughs]
translation.es: ¡Es más grande que toda mi casa!

translation.en: This is so nice.
What's up here? [gasps]
Oh, my God.
[squeaks] It has a claw-foot tub. I love claw-foot tu-- [gasps]
translation.es: ¡Una bañera con patas! Me encantan las bañeras…

translation.en: Oh, and a nice cozy robe.
Oh, that's so nice.
Hey, do you mind if I take a bath before dinner?
translation.es: ¿Te importa si me baño antes de cenar?

translation.en: No, of course not.
I'll go call my parents and get us a table.
translation.es: Llamaré a mis padres y buscaré una mesa.

translation.en: Okay.
Hi, Mrs. Rothswell.
I know, I know.
I'm sorry. I didn't mean to scare you.
Yeah, Yeah, I'm fine.
No, I-I haven't found her yet.
translation.es: No, aún no la he encontrado.

translation.en: Yeah. Yeah, it's still ticking.
Sorry, I dozed off.
All too much excitement for one day, I guess.
translation.es: Demasiada emoción por un día, supongo.

translation.en: -Nice dress, by the way. -Thank you.
Um, I-I-I wasn't sure what you wanted, so...
translation.es: No sabía qué querías, así que…

translation.en: Thanks.
So, uh, listen, uh, before we go home tomorrow,
translation.es: Oye, antes de irnos a casa mañana,

translation.en: maybe we could do some sightseeing,
-go to a nice restaurant-- -Home?
No, I can't go home. I have to keep looking.
translation.es: No puedo ir a casa. Tengo que seguir buscando.

translation.en: For what? I mean, we found all the names on the list.
Yeah, yeah, but maybe I made a mistake or something.
translation.es: Sí. - Sí, pero quizá cometí un error. - ¿En serio?

translation.en: You can't be serious?
translation.es: - Sí, pero quizá cometí un error. - ¿En serio?

translation.en: Mia, listen, you have to go home.
translation.es: Mía, escucha, tienes que ir a casa.

translation.en: You need this operation. This isn't some kind of game.
translation.es: Necesitas esta cirugía. No es un juego.

translation.en: I know, but I have to keep looking.
You can't keep putting your life on the line
translation.es: No puedes seguir arriesgando tu vida

translation.en: looking for someone who...
who might not wanna be found.
translation.es: que quizá no quiere ser encontrada.

translation.en: You've done your best, Mia.
I'm sorry.
I know. You're right.
But I just wanna look her in the eyes
translation.es: Pero quiero mirarla a los ojos

translation.en: and I wanna ask her why she didn't keep me.
translation.es: y preguntarle por qué no se quedó conmigo.

translation.en: Ask her how she could just abandon me and act like I never even existed.
translation.es: Preguntarle cómo pudo abandonarme y actuar como si nunca hubiera existido.

translation.en: Well, maybe she did it because it was best for you.
translation.es: Quizá fue porque era lo mejor para ti.

translation.en: Maybe she thought that you were better off with someone else.
translation.es: Tal vez pensó que estabas mejor con otra persona.

translation.en: -You don't understand. -No, you don't understand.
translation.es: - No entiendes. - No, tú no entiendes.

translation.en: You know, maybe if you stopped obsessing over some woman
translation.es: Tal vez si dejaras de obsesionarte con una mujer que no hizo más que darte a luz,

translation.en: who did nothing but give birth to you,
translation.es: de obsesionarte con una mujer que no hizo más que darte a luz,

translation.en: you'd actually start turning your attention to the people who really care about you.
translation.es: empezarías a prestar atención a quienes realmente te quieren.

translation.en: Kyle. [sighs]
I might be wrong, but I need to see this through.
translation.es: Quizá me equivoque, pero debo terminar esto.

translation.en: Just give me three days, and if I don't find her,
translation.es: Solo dame tres días. Y si no la encuentro, iré a casa y me operaré.

translation.en: I will go home and have the surgery.
translation.es: Y si no la encuentro, iré a casa y me operaré.

translation.en: I promise.
Three days, Mia.
No more.
-And if anything goes wrong... -Hey.
translation.es: - Y si algo sale mal… - Oye.

translation.en: If anything goes wrong,
I'll see you on Venus.
[Mia] Good morning.
[Kyle] Morning.
Sorry, I didn't hear you get up. Oh, no, I didn't wanna wake you up.
translation.es: - No te oí levantarte. - No quería despertarte.

translation.en: Hey, so I've been thinking a lot about your mother.
translation.es: He estado pensando mucho en tu madre.

translation.en: And, Mia, look at your mom's signature.
translation.es: Y, Mía, mira la firma de tu mamá.

translation.en: What does it say?
It says Maria Astilleros.
Or... what if it said Maria Ostilleros?
Look, what if the "A" was actually like an "O" and they just mistyped it?
translation.es: ¿Y si la A fuera una O y lo escribieron mal?

translation.en: Oh, then I want you to look at this.
Open it.
It's the same as my necklace.
It's from that small town.
And I looked it up and there's a lot of Maria Ostilleros,
translation.es: Y busqué y hay muchas María Ostilleros.

translation.en: but there's only one that lives near there.
translation.es: Pero solo una vive cerca de ahí.

translation.en: [exhales sharply] Oh, my God.
And I just found an address.
translation.es: Y acabo de encontrar una dirección.

translation.en: You know, we still have two more hours to go.
Why don't you get some sleep?
If I see anything really interesting, I'll wake you up. All right?
translation.es: Si veo algo realmente interesante, te despertaré, ¿sí?

translation.en: [Kyle] Hey, you gotta see this.
Hey. Hey, Mia.
Mia. Mia?
Hey, Mia? Mia!
Can I please get an update on Amelia Faith?
Excuse me? Are you Amelia's friend?
-Yeah. Is she okay? -She's stable for now.
translation.es: - Sí. ¿Está bien? - Está estable por ahora.

translation.en: However, her heart is very weak.
translation.es: De todos modos, su corazón está muy débil.

translation.en: I understand she's scared of undergoing the surgery,
translation.es: Entiendo que tenga miedo a la cirugía,

translation.en: but if she doesn't, she'll die.
translation.es: pero si no se opera, morirá.

translation.en: H-How, how long do you think she can hold out for?
She's supposed to get the surgery when we get home.
translation.es: Se operará al llegar a casa.

translation.en: She could last a month, a week.
translation.es: Podría ser un mes, una semana.

translation.en: We just don't know.
But definitely she can't fly in her condition.
translation.es: Pero no puede volar en su condición.

translation.en: Can I see her?
I need you to convince her to let us do the surgery.
translation.es: Debe convencerla de que nos deje operarla.

translation.en: Yeah. Yeah, sure, of course.
Could you take her ID to the nurse so they can fill out the paperwork?
translation.es: ¿Lleva su identificación a la enfermera para llenar los papeles?

translation.en: [softly] Yeah.
Kyle? Please, you have to help me.
Why is your ticket only one-way?
translation.es: ¿Por qué tu pasaje es solo de ida?

translation.en: You never intended on having that surgery, did you?
What was your plan, exactly?
You just keep going until you find her?
Waste away until you do. If you do.
translation.es: Consumirte hasta hacerlo. Si es que lo haces.

translation.en: No. Kyle...
No. Tell me it isn't true.
Please tell me you're gonna have that surgery.
translation.es: Por favor, dime que vas a operarte.

translation.en: Damn it, Mia.
You'd rather just give up than risk what, exactly?
translation.es: ¿Prefieres rendirte antes que arriesgarte a qué?

translation.en: Having someone love you?
Or loving someone yourself?
You don't understand.
My heart has an expiration date.
translation.es: Mi corazón tiene fecha de vencimiento.

translation.en: Then explain that to me.
I don't want them to open my heart until I get to meet my mom.
translation.es: No quiero que me abran el corazón hasta conocer a mi mamá.

translation.en: What about me? What about us?
translation.es: ¿Qué hay de mí? ¿Qué hay de nosotros?

translation.en: That is not fair.
I shouldn't have to choose one of you.
translation.es: No debería tener que elegir a uno.

translation.en: I-I can't do this.
Kyle!
Help! Help, help!
[laughing] Bro, check this. Bro, chill, I'm driving.
-[Josh] Funniest things-- -[Kyle] I'm being serious.
translation.es: - Lo más gracioso que he visto… - En serio.

translation.en: -Just look at it. -No, chill, man. Oh!
[Josh] Hey.
It's all coming back.
I'm sorry.
I'm so sorry.
I couldn't bring myself to tell you,
but it was me. It was my phone.
translation.es: pero fue por mí. Fue mi culpa.

translation.en: I was totally wasted and I showed you that video.
translation.es: Estaba muy ebrio y te mostré ese video.

translation.en: And-- And I looked at it.
[sniffles] And-- And I tried to get around that motorcycle.
I-It was an accident.
So you just gotta learn from it.
translation.es: Así que… solo debes aprender de eso.

translation.en: And... And forgive yourself.
I'm sorry, Kyle.
Yeah, me too, Josh.
-Mia. -Kyle.
I'm so sorry.
I'm sorry too.
I can't even begin to imagine.
But I wanna be by your side,
translation.es: Pero quiero estar a tu lado.

translation.en: and I don't care if-- if it's for an hour or-- or for years.
translation.es: Y no me importa si es por una hora o por años.

translation.en: It don't matter. As long as I'm with you.
I'm gonna take you to meet your mom.
translation.es: Voy a llevarte con tu mamá.

translation.en: [sobs] Really? Aw.
I just need a couple of hours.
translation.es: Solo necesito un par de horas.

translation.en: But I need you to promise me something.
I need you to promise me that you'll fight.
That we'll-- we'll come back and you'll have the operation
and you'll do everything you can to get through this...
translation.es: y harás todo lo que puedas para superar esto.

translation.en: [sniffles] ...for us.
[softly] Okay.
[Mia laughs] Okay.
Thank you.
I love you.
I love you too.
-Hola? -Hi.
Hi. Can I help you?
Yeah.
I came all the way from the United States because I'm looking for my mom
translation.es: Vine desde Estados Unidos porque estoy buscando a mi mamá

translation.en: and I was wondering if maybe you recognize this.
translation.es: y me preguntaba si tal vez reconoce esto.

translation.en: [sobbing] Amelia.
[Kyle] Right, one more thing, then we'll head back.
translation.es: Una cosa más y luego regresamos.

translation.en: It's amazing.
If things didn't work out with your mom, this was my backup plan.
translation.es: Si lo de tu mamá no salía bien, era mi plan B.

translation.en: I waited for that moment for so long
and I had so many questions,
but when I got to that door today, none of it mattered.
translation.es: Pero cuando llegué a esa puerta, nada importaba.

translation.en: All I could think about was you.
Oh, and one more thing.
[laughs] My song?
May I have this dance?
Yes, you may.
I'm scared.
I'll be right by your side, Mia.
This is all your fault.
I was never afraid to die before I met you.
translation.es: Nunca tuve miedo de morir antes de conocerte.

translation.en: I don't wanna miss this.
-Mia? Mia! -[gasping]
No, no, no, no.
-Mia? Mia? -[gasping]
Mia!
[Kyle] Some people change your life forever.
translation.es: Algunas personas cambian tu vida para siempre.

translation.en: Some people make you strive to be a better person.
translation.es: Algunas personas te hacen esforzarte por ser mejor persona.

translation.en: Some people help you find yourself right when you're ready to give up.
translation.es: Algunas personas te ayudan a hallar el rumbo cuando vas a rendirte.

translation.en: Some people aren't invisible.
Now, someone special once told me,
translation.es: Alguien especial me dijo una vez

translation.en: there will always be somebody somewhere
translation.es: que siempre habrá alguien, en algún lugar,

translation.en: who is happy that you were born.
[Kyle] Well, this is it.
Please, uh, be careful driving. Are you sure it's safe?
translation.es: Ten cuidado al conducir. ¿Crees que es seguro?

translation.en: Yes, it's not like this is my first road trip, Mom.
I am proud of you, son.
-You take care of yourself. -Yeah.
Okay. Get out of here.
You only got two weeks to get to Boston, so...
translation.es: Solo tienes dos semanas para llegar a Boston.

translation.en: You sure you can drive this thing? It's harder than it looks.
translation.es: ¿Puedes conducirla? Es más difícil de lo que parece.

translation.en: I had a pretty good teacher.
♪ There's something About her hand holding mine ♪
[Mia] I thought my trip to Spain was about my past,
translation.es: Pensaba que mi viaje a España era sobre mi pasado,

translation.en: but it was really about my future.
To find someone who makes my heart so full that it could burst, but in a good way.
translation.es: Hallar a quien llene tanto mi corazón que pueda explotar, pero en buen sentido.

translation.en: I've always looked at Venus as a place,
translation.es: Siempre vi a Venus como un lugar,

translation.en: but it turns out my Venus was a person,
translation.es: pero resulta que mi Venus era una persona.

translation.en: and not the person I thought it would be. One who made life worth fighting for.
translation.es: Y no quien pensé. Alguien que hizo que valiera la pena luchar por la vida.

translation.en: Put your hands on the steering wheel. Okay.
[Mia] This right here, this is what it must be like on Venus.
translation.es: Esto, aquí, es lo que debe ser estar en Venus.
